title: Tom Gleeson (rugby union)
text:
Tom Gleeson (born 26 September 1985) is a former Irish <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He played as a centre.
Munster.
He made his <a href="Munster%20Rugby">Munster</a> debut against <a href="Border%20Reivers%20%28rugby%29">Border Reivers</a> in September 2006. His first try for Munster came against <a href="Connacht%20Rugby">Connacht</a> in December 2010. Gleeson left Munster at the end of the 2011–12 season.
